articles.title: I replaced my Pixel 9 Pro with this $125 Android phone for a week - and it wasn't so bad
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: Nuu launched the Nuu N20 phone, available on Amazon for $125. The phone features a 6.5-inch, 90Hz display, 6GB RAM, a 1.6Ghz CPU, and runs on Android 14. It includes a fingerprint scanner and face unlock.

articles.title: Electric shaver vs razor: What delivers the best shaving experience?
articles.author: Leon Poultney
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new and smarter version of its Airwrap styling tool along with a companion app. The new Airwrap aims to provide users with enhanced styling capabilities.

articles.title: 19 Mother's Day Gifts That Mom Will Genuinely Appreciate (And Actually Use)
articles.author: Liza Hicks
articles.summary: Laifen introduces a compact and luxurious hair dryer. Céla offers a black gold coffee scrub for a mini spa experience. BEIS presents a weekender bag with multiple compartments. Kindle Paperwhite features a waterproof e-reader with adjustable font. Ninja Creami transforms ingredients into desserts. This is J offers matching family pajamas. Kilne features the Always Pan as a multi-functional kitchen product. Mejuri offers pearl bracelet. Nespresso introduces Vertuo Pop+ Coffee and Espresso Machine. HP offers portable photo printer.

articles.title: Cholula shakes up product portfolio
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: McCormick & Co. is launching 11 new products.

articles.title: Sir James Dyson receives cheeky birthday present from biggest rivals
articles.author: Zahra Khaliq
articles.summary: Samsung introduced its new Bespoke Jet™ AI vacuum cleaner by delivering it to Sir James Dyson as a birthday gift. To further promote the product, Samsung is giving away 78 Bespoke Jet™ AI vacuums, valued at £1,200 each, at its Samsung KX store in London, along with discount vouchers and demonstrations of the product.

articles.title: Motorola AI features phone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge, its latest flagship phone.

articles.title: Motorola pre order April 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola unveiled its latest flagship, the Motorola Edge. The Motorola Edge represents a new product introduction from the mobile innovation leader.

articles.title: Edge 60 Pro specifications
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola has unveiled the Motorola Edge, its latest flagship product.

articles.title: Motorola Flipkart sale
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola, a global mobile innovator, has introduced its new flagship product, the Motorola Edge.

articles.title: Motorola 90W TurboPower
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola, a global leader in mobile innovation, has unveiled its latest flagship, the Motorola Edge. This launch signifies a new product introduction by Motorola.

articles.title: Motorola 50MP camera phone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola, a mobile innovation leader, has launched its newest flagship phone, the Motorola Edge.

articles.title: Dimensity 8350 Extreme processor
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola, a global leader in mobile innovation, has launched its latest flagship product, the Motorola Edge.

articles.title: Motorola AI smartphone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola, a global leader in mobile innovation, has unveiled its latest flagship, the Motorola Edge. This product launch signifies Motorola's commitment to mobile innovation.

articles.title: Motorola wireless charging phone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola unveiled its latest flagship, the Motorola Edge. The company is positioned as a global leader in mobile innovation. This took place in Udaipur on April 30, 2025.

articles.title: 6000mAh battery Motorola
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola, a global leader in mobile innovation, has unveiled its latest flagship, the Motorola Edge.

articles.title: Motorola quad curved display
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola, a global leader in mobile innovation, has launched its latest flagship product, the Motorola Edge.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro colours
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola has unveiled the Motorola Edge, its latest flagship product.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro Pantone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola unveiled the Motorola Edge, its latest flagship product. Motorola is a global leader in mobile innovation.

articles.title: I found hidden Amazon deals on best-selling Dyson fans and vacuums
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Amazon is offering limited-time discounts on Dyson products. Deals include the Dyson Hot+Cool AM09 Jet Focus Heater and Fan and the Dyson 360 Vis Nav Robot Vacuum. Dyson is known for innovative gadgets and smart vacuums.

articles.title: Unseen discounts of upto 87% on vaccum cleaner during the Amazon Summer Sale 2025: Ensure cleanliness while saving money
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: Dyson, DREAME, ECOVACS, MI Xiaomi, Philips, AGARO, Kärcher and Eureka Forbes are offering discounts on their vacuum cleaners during the Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025. The products range from traditional vacuum cleaners like the Dyson Big Ball and Philips PowerPro to robot vacuums like the DREAME D10 Plus Gen 2 and ECOVACS DEEBOT N30 Pro Omni and wet/dry models like the AGARO Ace, and Eureka Forbes Ultimo, catering to different cleaning needs and preferences. Kärcher DS 6 boasts HEPA filter technology and water filtration system.

articles.title: T&C Tried & True: Can a $6000 At-Home Laser Really Transform Your Skin?
articles.author: Sophie Dweck
articles.summary: Lyma has launched an updated version of its original device, the Lyma Laser Pro. The Lyma Laser Pro uses the same technology as the original device but with a much larger treatment lens and utilizes significantly more power. The Lyma Laser Pro costs $6,000.

articles.title: A Business Leader's Guide To Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)
articles.author: John Werner
articles.summary: Digital agencies are now offering a new service called "AI Readiness" audits and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) services. This service aims to help businesses adapt to the shifting search landscape where AI-generated answers are becoming more prevalent. The goal of GEO is to ensure a business's content is prominently featured in AI responses, maintaining visibility and brand awareness.

articles.title: This New One-of-a-Kind Pagani Supercar Proves the Zonda Isn't Dead Yet
articles.summary: Pagani unveiled the Zonda Unico, a one-off Zonda built after a client's request. This bespoke model, finished in dark blue, features a large spoiler and is likely powered by an AMG-made V-12 engine producing 760 horsepower. The Zonda Unico program allows customers almost unlimited configuration choices for both the exterior and interior, with aerodynamic and mechanical upgrades.

articles.title: ‘Diva Pawule Avurudda' brings families together in celebration
articles.summary: Diva launched its newest variant 'Diva Fresh Gardenia & Rose' detergent powder with 'Advance Perfume Technology'. This product fights against dirt and malodour, leaving a long lasting fragrance on clothes. The launch was celebrated during the Sinhala and Tamil New Year with the 'Diva Pawule Avurudda' initiative.

articles.title: Walmart Great Value Items That Taste Just As Good (If Not Better) Than Brand-Name, According To Customers
articles.author: Amber Winston
articles.summary: Walmart's 'Great Value' brand offers several grocery items that customers find comparable to or even better than name-brand alternatives. These include Great Value Thin Pretzel Sticks, Frosted Strawberry Toaster Pastries, Hazelnut Spread, Sea Salt Caramel ice cream, Rippled Cheddar & Sour Cream Potato Chips, Honey Nut O's, Buttery Round Crackers, Salsa Verde, Crème-Filled Chocolate Cupcakes, Steak Sauce, Garlic Breadsticks and Cream Soda, all available at a lower price point.

articles.title: Welcome to Sam Altman's Orb Store
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: World has opened a new storefront in San Francisco. The store features eight brand-new orbs.

articles.title: These new Google Messages features make Android texting better for everyone
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Google is rolling out two new features for Google Messages: an Unsubscribe button to combat spam and a visually refined landscape interface. The Unsubscribe button is designed to automatically appear on spam messages. Google is also working on incorporating features like sensitive content warnings and real-time location sharing into Google Messages.

articles.title: Walmart is offering $170 off the Dyson V8 Absolute Cordless Vacuum
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a limited-time flash deal on the Dyson V8 Absolute Cordless Vacuum during Walmart+ Week, discounting it to $349.99. The Dyson V8 Absolute features specialized cleaner heads for hard floors and carpets, along with an advanced filtration system.

articles.title: Welcome to Sam Altman's Orb Store
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: World launched its new San Francisco storefront with eight brand-new orbs.

articles.title: Samsung is giving away FREE vacuum cleaners worth £1,199 in cheeky dig at rival
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Samsung is giving away its Bespoke AI Jet Ultra vacuum cleaners, launched at the end of March, in a promotional stunt targeting Dyson. The Bespoke AI Jet Ultra features 400W suction power, AI Cleaning, and up to 160 minutes of continuous cleaning with two batteries. The first 78 customers with a birthday card for Sir Dyson at Samsung's London store will receive a free vacuum.

articles.title: Sam Altman Launches Dystopian Iris Scanning Orb In The U.S.
articles.author: Donna Hancock
articles.summary: World.org is offering a comprehensive ecosystem that includes WorldApp, WorldChain, and WorldCoin. Furthermore, Altman is creating a new OpenAI social network, potentially positioning it as a competitor to X. These initiatives suggest the launch of new digital products and services focused on identity verification, social networking, and potentially financial services.

articles.title: With the Vornado ARA, I Finally Found a Tower Fan I Love — Because It's Also a Lamp
articles.summary: Vornado introduced the ARA, a tower fan with integrated ambient lighting. This new product features a metal grille, multiple light settings, and an energy-efficient DC-powered motor and it costs $250. The ARA also has a five-year warranty from Vornado.

articles.title: Innovative New 65″ Samsung Neo QLED 8K QN900F TV with Content Upscaling is On Sale
articles.author: Jessica Fritsch
articles.summary: Samsung is offering the 65" Class Neo QLED 8K QN900F Vision AI Smart TV with Content Upscaling on sale for $3,299.99. This TV features 8K resolution with AI-powered upscaling, a 120Hz refresh rate, anti-glare screen, and NeoQLED technology with the NQ8 AI Gen2 Processor for enhanced color and sound.

articles.title: Viral Manchester restaurant opens new Trafford Centre café with cute animal-themed ice creams
articles.author: Adam Maidment
articles.summary: Hello Oriental has launched a new café named Hello Dezato in the Trafford Centre, offering Asian-inspired ice creams, bubble teas, and sweet treats. A key feature is the new taiyaki ice cream, served in cute animal-shaped waffle cones like pandas and crocodiles, with rotating flavors available twice a week.

articles.title: 19 Pieces From Target That Are Stylish, Comfy, And Great For Spring
articles.author: Haley Lyndes
articles.summary: Target is featuring a wide array of new clothing items for spring, including a wide-leg jumpsuit, ribbed tank top, fleece half-zip pullover, high-rise leggings, duster cardigan, satin pants, floral cardigan, open-back top, mesh cardigan, denim jumpsuit, midi shift dress, fleece bomber jacket, trench coat, maxi dress, mini skort, trouser shorts, body suit, linen pants and pullover sweater. These new additions are designed to offer comfort, style, and versatility for various occasions.

articles.title: Exclusive: Moto Edge 70 Leaks Just Days After Edge 60 Launch — Motorola's Not Slowing Down
articles.author: Alexander Maxham
articles.summary: Motorola is anticipated to launch the Moto Edge 70, the successor to the Moto Edge 60, potentially around September 24. The new device is expected to retain curved edges and a vegan leather back with three cameras, featuring possible upgrades like the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 and 12GB of RAM. The phone will likely compete with Apple's iPhone 17 series.

articles.title: McDonald's customers are ordering ‘Cotton Candy Sprite' from the secret menu
articles.author: Joyann Jeffrey
articles.summary: McDonald's customers are creating a new drink called "Cotton Candy Sprite" by adding French vanilla syrup to Sprite. This menu hack, popularized on TikTok and YouTube, is being praised by many users, creating a buzz around this unofficial menu item. The Cotton Candy Sprite is only available in stores and not through online ordering.

articles.title: Angel's Pizza heats up summer with the new Bulgogi Gochujang Pizza
articles.summary: Angel's Pizza launched the Bulgogi Gochujang Pizza nationwide on April 28, 2025. This limited-edition pizza features beef bulgogi, gochujang glaze, mozzarella, and vegetables on their signature dough, finished with Korean-style sauce. This offering brings Korean flavors to the Filipino market.

articles.title: The Growing Importance of Web Design in the Industrial Sector
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Advancreative, an SEO services agency and web design company, is helping manufacturers optimize their websites. This service aims to enhance manufacturers' online presence and leverage their websites as key sales tools, capitalizing on the shift of industrial buyers to online research.

articles.title: 'Flattering' stripy dress perfect for spring and summer that 'looks more expensive'
articles.author: Bethany Gavaghan
articles.summary: New Look is selling a 'Cream Striped Puffed Sleeve dress' for £35.99, noted for its flattering square neckline and comfortable style. The dress has received positive reviews from shoppers, who highlight its flattering fit and suitability for summer. Other dresses from competitor companies are also being mentioned.

articles.title: Toyota Innova HyCross Exclusive Edition Priced Rs 32.58 Lakh
articles.author: Michael Gonsalves
articles.summary: Toyota introduced the Innova HyCross Exclusive Edition ZX(O), a new MPV variant, priced at Rs 32.58 lakh. This edition features bold dual-tone styling and 19 premium features and will be available in limited numbers from May to July 2025.

articles.title: Motorola Launches Edge 60 Pro in India at ₹29,999: Features AI Camera, 1.5K Quad-Curved Display, and 6000mAh Battery
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Pro, a new flagship smartphone priced from ₹29,999. The device features advanced AI capabilities, a triple 50MP camera setup, a 1.5K quad-curved display, and runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme chipset. Pre-orders begin April 30 and the phone will be available on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores across India.

articles.title: A.L.L. Laundry Service
articles.summary: A.L.L. Laundry Service provides commercial laundry solutions including the installation of high-quality commercial laundry equipment, regular maintenance, and prompt repair services. They also offer smart, cloud-based machines that provide real-time data and analytics for property managers.

articles.title: The 5-second fix for lost phones
articles.author: Tarek Salame
articles.summary: Google Assistant and Siri offer a service where users can locate their phones by using voice commands like "Hey Google, find my phone," or "Hey Siri, where's my phone?". This feature bypasses silent settings and triggers an emergency ring, helping users find their phones even when set on silent. Users need to enable 'Hey Google' or 'Hey Siri' voice activation in their phone settings to utilize this service.

articles.title: New astronomy products blossoming this month
articles.author: Astronomy
articles.summary: Open sky Sky View Tents of Buena Vista, CO, is launching the new Sky View XL Stargazing Tent. This tent is designed for individuals seeking coverage while observing the stars.

articles.title: ‘Opening doors we've never seen before': IGNITE's novAI Labs roadshow launch starting in Yarmouth
articles.author: Kathy Johnson
articles.summary: IGNITE Atlantic, immediac, and Digital Nova Scotia are launching novAI Labs, a four-stop roadshow to introduce small and medium-sized businesses to AI tools. The workshops will provide demonstrations of real-world AI applications and expert guidance on integrating AI into business operations. The launch event is happening at IGNITE Southern in Yarmouth on May 5.

articles.title: How businesses can take advantage of the AI agent boom
articles.author: Priya Sonn
articles.summary: Several AI agents, including Manus AI, Oracle AI Agent Studio, and OpenAI Operator, have been launched, indicating a new technology on the horizon with more sophisticated conversation capabilities, the ability to perform complex tasks, and the potential to learn and adapt.

articles.title: Celebrity tan artist Isabel Vita spills the secrets behind her at-home 'Dolce Glow' products after bronzing J-Lo, the Kardashians, & more
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: Isabel Alysa, founder of Dolce Glow, has launched a new tanning brand called Sunnee BaeSkin, now available in Ulta Beauty stores. This new brand aims to offer affordable self-tanning options while maintaining luxury-level results. The launch caters to a broader audience seeking accessible yet high-quality tanning solutions.

articles.title: Swiggy expands 10-minute food delivery service 'Bolt' to over 500 cities
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Swiggy utilizes the 'Bolt' service for at least 10% of its food delivery orders. 'Bolt' is a service provided by Swiggy.

articles.title: Mobile under ₹30,000: Motorola Edge 60 Pro vs Nothing Phone 3a Pro - Which is better?
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Motorola recently launched the Edge 60 Pro phone, while Nothing introduced the Phone 3a Pro. Both phones are priced around ₹30,000.

articles.title: Happy birthday sucker! Dyson gets a very cheeky birthday gift from his rivals
articles.author: Antigoni Pitta
articles.summary: Samsung delivered its latest vacuum model, the Bespoke Jet™ AI, to Sir James Dyson's doorstep as a marketing stunt. Samsung claims this stick vacuum cleaner is the most powerful in the world. Samsung is also giving away vacuums worth over £90,000 at its Samsung KX store.

articles.title: Nvidia is working on China-tailored chips again after US export ban, The Information reports
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Nvidia is modifying the design of its artificial intelligence chips for Chinese customers like Alibaba, ByteDance, and Tencent to comply with U.S. export regulations. Samples of the new chip are expected to be available in June, and Nvidia is also working on a China-specific version of its latest-generation AI chip, Blackwell.

articles.title: CEO Strategies: Satya Nadella On Reconceptualizing What The Web Looks Like
articles.summary: Microsoft is focusing on AI, demonstrated by the integration of Copilot, an AI assistant, into the reimagined Windows experience. The company is also investing in cloud and AI infrastructure in South Africa, expanding access to these technologies. These initiatives represent Microsoft's commitment to democratizing technology and providing new tools for entrepreneurs.

articles.title: I can't believe Aldi are doing Mojito-flavoured tortilla chips and nacho cheese pork sausages now...
articles.author: Jack Marshall
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its Taste of Mexico range with new products such as Mojito Fiesta Tortilla Chips, Margarita Marinade, Nacho Cheese Pork Sausages, and Churro Loaf Cake. The range also includes Chipotle Chilli Wraps, Fiesta Hot Sauce, Agave Infused Lemon Iced Tea, XXL Deltas Salted Tortilla Chips, and returning favorites, accompanied by themed partyware and serveware.

articles.title: McDonald's will launch new breakfast menu item next week
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing the Saver Bacon Roll (£2.19) and Sausage Roll (£1.99) as part of a new morning Saver Menu. These items will be available on toasted hamburger buns with a choice of ketchup or brown sauce in over 330 McDonald's outlets across the north west region starting Wednesday, May 7 and later rolled out to more locations later in the year.

articles.title: I tried McDonald's new 'lighter' £2 breakfast meal that's coming soon
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing the Saver Bacon Roll (£2.19) and Sausage Roll (£1.99) to its breakfast menu as part of the new morning Saver Menu.  The new seasonal menu will be launched on Wednesday, May 7, including the return of the Steakhouse Stack burger and the McSpicy and Frank's RedHot collaboration.

articles.title: I tried McDonald's new £2 breakfast meal that's coming out soon
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: McDonald's is testing the new Saver Bacon Roll (£2.19) and Sausage Roll (£1.99) in over 330 stores, featuring meat and sauce on toasted hamburger buns as part of a budget-friendly Saver Menu. These items are launched alongside a new seasonal menu on Wednesday, May 7, which includes the Steakhouse Stack burger, McSpicy and Frank's RedHot collaboration, Frozen Cherry Lemonade, and Biscoff McFlurry or Frappe.

articles.title: I tried McDonald's new £2 breakfast meal that's coming out in a few days
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing the Saver Bacon Roll (£2.19) and Sausage Roll (£1.99) to its breakfast menu as part of a new morning Saver Menu. These items, served on toasted hamburger buns, will be available in over 330 outlets across the north west region starting May 7. Other new additions include the Frozen Cherry Lemonade, Biscoff McFlurry, and Biscoff Frappe, along with the return of the Steakhouse Stack burger and the McSpicy and Frank's RedHot collaboration.

articles.title: I was one of the first to try McDonald's new menu and was less than impressed
articles.author: Paul McAuley
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing a new breakfast saver menu in the UK, featuring sausage sandwiches and bacon rolls, starting May 7th in select locations before a wider rollout later this year. Simultaneously, McDonald's is launching a Summer menu, which includes new burgers, desserts, and a new beverage while removing the Philly Cheese Stack from the menu.

articles.title: Xiaomi India Doubles Down on Customer Experience with New AI-Powered Support Centre
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Xiaomi India has launched a new AI-enabled Customer Support Centre to offer faster and more inclusive service experiences. This upgraded facility provides customer support in 11 regional languages and 24x7 availability across chat and social media. It also introduces advanced infrastructure designed to improve response times and offers video demos and live video assistance for product support.

articles.title: The Future is Here:Visa announces new era of commerce featuring AI
articles.author: Nairametrics
articles.summary: Visa introduced a new era of commerce, showcasing AI-enabled advancements that allow consumers to find and buy with AI. They also announced new strategic partnerships and product innovations at the Visa Global Product Drop.

articles.title: «Es fand praktisch kein Kampf statt»: Aber dank Social Media kann Brian Keller dennoch Profiboxer sein
articles.author: Bote Der Urschweiz Ag
articles.summary: Google is expanding access to its experimental AI Mode, removing the waitlist for users in the U.S. aged 18 and older enrolled in Labs.  New functionalities allow users to find restaurants or trip essentials with visual place and product cards offering real-time details. Google is also introducing a feature to resume past searches within AI Mode, enhancing the user experience for longer projects.

articles.title: Toyota Innova Hycross Exclusive Edition launched: Price, what's new
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Toyota has launched the Innova Hycross Exclusive Edition, a limited-run model based on the ZX(O) trim and priced at Rs 32.58 lakh. This edition features dual-tone styling, blacked-out elements, and upgraded interiors with new upholstery and ambient lighting. The Exclusive Edition will be available only between May and July 2025.

articles.title: 32 Products You Should Buy Now If You Want Your Home Clean And Tidy All Year Long
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff cleaning paste is introduced as a TikTok-famous product that can remove grime from surfaces. YouCopia offers a turntable with removable compartments for organizing items. Additionally, the article highlights a mold and mildew stain remover in a squeezable gel formula.

articles.title: Dyson Car+Boat handheld vacuum review
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Car+Boat, a handheld vacuum cleaner designed for use in cars and boats, priced at £249.99. It features the technology from the V8 vacuum, a motor that spins up at 110,000rpm, a battery life of up to 50 minutes, 115 air watts of suction and comes with a standard beater for carpets, and a dual function nozzle with a slide-down brush for tight crevices.

articles.title: 4 Reasons I Simply Don't Care About AI PCs
articles.author: Alvin Wanjala
articles.summary: Microsoft is planning to bring more Copilot+ AI features to Windows 11 devices, requiring an internet connection for cloud-based operation. ASUS ProArt PX13 laptop launched with an integrated NPU, however, the AI assistant, Omni, does not use it, instead it runs on the integrated GPU. Copilot on ASUS Zenbook S 14 and ProArt PX13 runs in the cloud without utilizing the CPU, GPU, or NPU.

articles.title: Alibaba launches Taobao fast-delivery service ahead of schedule
articles.author: Xinmei Shen
articles.summary: Alibaba introduced its Taobao Instant Commerce initiative ahead of schedule. This new service, designed as an upgrade to Alibaba's local delivery operation via Ele.me, aims to fulfill online orders of food and consumer items in under an hour across 50 major cities in China.

articles.title: ESScent Of The Week: Angel Dust By Fugazzi Is The 'Blanket In A Bottle' Scent You Didn't Know You Needed
articles.author: Kimberly Wilson
articles.summary: Fugazzi launched 'Angel Dust', a warm, clean, musky fragrance retailing at $105 for 50ml. The scent features cashmeran, white amber crystals, Calabrian bergamot, and pepper notes and is described as versatile and comforting. It has pairings with Dedcool's Milk, Skylar's Salt Air and By Rosie Jane's Dulce.

articles.title: LG Display to debut world's first blue phosphorescent OLED
articles.author: Psy Thinktank
articles.summary: LG Display has successfully verified its new blue phosphorescent OLED panel, a first in the display industry. Designed for smartphones, tablets, and IT devices, the panel aims to serve emerging high-efficiency, high-resolution markets like AI PCs and AR/VR headsets, and will debut at the SID Display Week 2025 conference. The new design reduces power consumption by 15% while maintaining reliability.

articles.title: Revolut vs. Mobile Carriers: Unlimited EU & US Roaming
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Revolut is launching 'Mobile Plans', a new mobile service offering unlimited calls, SMS messages, and data, including 20GB EU/US roaming data. Initially available in the UK and Germany, the service aims to provide flexible, contract-free mobile connectivity managed directly through the Revolut app. Customers can join a waiting list for early access and a discounted rate.

articles.title: I'm an ex McDonald's worker - what I think of the new breakfast menu item
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching the new Saver Bacon Roll (£2.19) and Sausage Roll (£1.99) in over 330 stores across the northwest on May 7. The new breakfast items are part of the new morning Saver Menu and will be launched alongside the new seasonal menu.

articles.title: Dyson V15 Detect Absolute Review: Yes, This Premium Model is Worth the Upgrade
articles.author: Brandon Russell
articles.summary: Dyson has introduced the V15 Detect Absolute stick vacuum, an upgrade featuring an LCD screen for real-time data, an intelligent suction system, and a laser cleaning head. This model boasts extended runtime and enhanced dust detection, making it an efficient cleaning solution.

articles.title: Your Future Self Will Write You A Love Letter For Incorporating These 28 New Skincare Products Into Your Routine
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new skincare and beauty products from different companies. Highlights include Laneige's new Glaze Craze Tinted Polypeptide Lip Serum flavors, Tonymoly's new Plum Bum line featuring a Tightening Peptide Body Serum, and Tree Hut's new Lotus Water Shea Sugar Scrub.

articles.title: 47 Skin: The fast-growing skincare brand born in the North
articles.author: Head
articles.summary: 47 Skin launched as a direct-to-consumer skincare brand in 2018 with the mission to offer high-performance, simplified routines. Their product line includes bestsellers like the Anti-Blemish & Scar Repair™ Serum, the Everyday Cleanser, and the viral Silver Mask, which are powered by Silver Chitoderm®.

articles.title: How a Northern skincare brand grew from one small discovery into a global success
articles.author: Marc Reeves
articles.summary: 47 Skin launched in 2018 as a direct-to-consumer skincare brand. The brand's products, including the Anti-Blemish & Scar Repair™ Serum, the Everyday Cleanser, and the Silver Mask, are powered by patented Silver Chitoderm®, a compound that hydrates while eliminating 99.9% of breakout-causing bacteria.

articles.title: Can ChatGPT's Shopify deal hurt Google's search business?
articles.author: John Xavier
articles.summary: OpenAI is experimenting with a shopping feature in ChatGPT that visually displays product details and pricing. This feature is being developed to enable users to discover and purchase products within the chatbot interface, potentially through an integration with Shopify.  Shopify's CEO, Tobi Lutke, has expressed excitement about the integration's potential to create a new mode of shopping.

articles.title: Sanitary pads exit the shadows in Iran, reflecting a broader fight for visibility
articles.author: Maryam Sinaiee
articles.summary: Iranian brand My Lady introduced a new marketing display featuring transparent packaging for sanitary pads. The company's Instagram page was previously taken down after releasing a video marking International Women's Day. The brand has a decade-long focus on education and taboo-breaking.

articles.title: Does Rodial's best-selling Dragon's Blood Sculpting Gel live up to the hype?
articles.author: Georgia Lockstone
articles.summary: Rodial's Dragon's Blood Sculpting Gel is designed to plump, tone, and firm the skin, containing dragon's blood, Collageneer®, and Volufiline™. Bulldog Skincare launches new Anytime Daily UV Moisturiser SPF 50 for the summer.

articles.title: 37 'Gifts' To Yourself That Are Actually Super Practical To Own
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay introduced its Super Serum Body Wash, a body wash version of their TikTok-famous facial serum, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. Ninja released its portable Crispi Air Fryer, an all-in-one system that cooks food in the same container you eat from, featuring auto-shutoff and various cooking modes. Oxo launched its new compact Brew Rapid Brewer, a faster and more portable cold brew maker that doesn't require charging or plugging in.

articles.title: M&S shoppers reckon they've found the ‘perfect' pair of  sandals after wearing them ‘for 12 hours at a Spanish wedding'
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has introduced new leather sandals available in platinum, tan, and black, ranging in sizes 3 to 8. M&S also launched a skirt available in black and tomato colors in petite, regular and long sizes. Both products have received high ratings from customers.

articles.title: I found my signature summer scent
articles.author: Sara Hussain
articles.summary: CHANEL launched CHANCE EAU SPLENDIDE, a new fragrance added to the CHANCE line. It is available on Nykaa's e-store and in select Luxe doors. The fragrance is described as a summer scent with notes of raspberry, rose geranium, white musk, and cedar.

articles.title: Toyota Innova Hycross Exclusive Edition Launched in India - Price, Features, and More
articles.author: Vatsal Agrawal
articles.summary: Toyota Kirloskar Motors has launched the Innova Hycross Exclusive Edition in India, focusing on the ZX (O) variant. This edition includes cosmetic updates to the exteriors, interiors, and feature list, with exterior enhancements such as a dual-tone color and interior upgrades like a dual-tone design and feature additions like a wireless charger.

articles.title: See Every Angle of the Porsche 911 Carrera Coupe Reimagined by Singer
articles.summary: Singer introduced a new vehicle inspired by the Porsche 911 Carrera Coupe 'with Super Sport Equipment' from the 1980s. The new vehicle is based on and inspired by the 1980s model.

articles.title: I prefer this OnePlus tablet over iPads for mobile entertainment - and it's on sale
articles.author: Max Buondonno
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus Pad 2, an Android tablet with flagship specs and a premium design. The tablet can be paired with a keyboard and pen (sold separately) to function as a laptop, and features an aluminum design, quality speakers, and pogo pins for a keyboard. A discount of $100 is available with promo code "HELLOMAY" and a free gift (OnePlus Stylo 2 or OnePlus Folio Case 2) can be chosen.

articles.title: Apartment dwellers, rejoice! This tiny robot and handheld vacuum combo surprised me
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: SwitchBot launched the K10+ Combo, a robot vacuum cleaner designed for apartment dwellers and small cleaning areas. The combo includes a lightweight handheld vacuum and boasts 3,000Pa of suction power with LiDAR sensor for mapping.

articles.title: Google's AI Mode may be the upgrade Search desperately needs - how to try it for free
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Google updated AI Mode, enhancing its capabilities for planning summer vacations and shopping trips. The updated AI Mode combines Search's real-time information access with generative AI for personalized answers and supports visual place and product cards with information like ratings, reviews, hours, and shippable options.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy XCover7 Pro Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Samsung officially announced the Galaxy XCover7 Pro on April 14, 2025. This 5G-ready rugged smartphone features a removable 4350 mAh battery with 15W wired charging. The phone comes with Android 15 + One UI 7, 6GB RAM, 128GB internal storage, and a dual-camera setup including a 50MP wide lens and 8MP ultrawide lens.

articles.title: ‘I won't holiday without it', Home Bargains shoppers say as store releases 99p product for removing sand at the beach
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Home Bargains has introduced a new product called "Sand Away" priced at 99p, designed for quickly removing sand from skin at the beach.  The product is described as absorbing moisture from the sand, making it easy to brush off, and is being hailed as an essential item for beach trips.

articles.title: ‘I won't holiday without it', Home Bargains shoppers say as store releases 99p product for removing sand at the beach
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Home Bargains is selling a new product called "Sand Away" for 99p, designed to remove sand from skin by absorbing moisture.  The product is marketed as an essential item for beach trips. This "Sand Away" product is similar to the "Beach Powder" product that was featured on Dragon's Den.

articles.title: I&N: IT Solutions for Pregnancy, Childbirth & Childcare
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: I&N's brand Beaddle is promoting its baby care products at the 2025 Kobe Baby Fair. Beaddle is offering discounted baby bottle detergent (83% off for the first daily visitors) and infant laundry detergent sets (up to 72% off), along with free 'Beaddle experience packs' (unscented detergent and fiber softener samples) to SNS followers. The event aims to showcase Beaddle's safe, EWG green-grade ingredient products.

articles.title: R/GA rolls out AI Search Optimisation platform
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: R/GA has launched its AI Search Optimisation (ASO) Platform, a proprietary tool developed under R/GA's AI Products Practice, supported by a $50M Innovation Fund. The platform offers real-time search health checks and deep visibility into AI-driven search experiences, enabling brands to track, measure, and optimise their AI presence across platforms like Google Gemini, Perplexity, ChatGPT, Claude and Deepseek.

articles.title: Terra unveils new ambassadors from everyday consumers
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Terra Seasoning Cube launched the 'Unwrapping Joy' campaign. This initiative highlights everyday Nigerians and their acts of kindness in their communities. The campaign represents a departure from celebrity endorsements, focusing instead on meaningful consumer engagement.

articles.title: Generative AI: From Hype to Useful Tool
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: SWYM, OpenX, Mondelez and Infillion are mentioned in the context of launching or improving AI-driven solutions for audience segmentation, fraud detection, content creation and API improvements. Specifically, SWYM uses AI to map and segment audiences, OpenX uses AI to combat fraud and enhance inventory quality, Mondelez uses generative AI to improve content quality and e-commerce operations, and Infillion is upgrading their APIs to enable the usage of agentic AI.

articles.title: Car review: MG S5's appeal is beyond skin-deep
articles.author: Lee Nian Tjoe
articles.summary: MG launched the S5, a new compact sport utility vehicle (SUV). The MG S5 aims to compete in the congested SUV segment with its spaciousness, equipment, and engaging drive. The Chinese-owned brand MG is trying to establish its presence in the market.

articles.title: Dyson competitor gifts Sir James vacuum cleaner for birthday
articles.author: Michael Ribbeck
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra, claiming it to be the world's most powerful stick vacuum with 400W suction power and AI-powered surface detection.  To promote the launch, Samsung conducted a marketing campaign and also plans a giveaway of £90,000 worth of vacuums at their flagship store.

articles.title: CDNetworks Empowers Global Enterprises to Seamlessly Enter Emerging Markets with Ready-to-Market Solutions
articles.author: PR Wire
articles.summary: CDNetworks is reinforcing its commitment to supporting global enterprises expanding into emerging markets by offering a ready-to-market portfolio of web performance and security solutions. These solutions include cloud security, web & network performance, media delivery, and edge computing, designed to ensure efficient content delivery and optimized performance in emerging markets.

articles.title: 57 Beauty Products You'll Use To The Last Drop
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of several new beauty and personal care products across various brands. Key products include Olay Super Serum Body Wash, e.l.f. Soft Glam Foundation, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Essence's Lash Princess mascara, Cremo Body Wash, and Eos' Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere Body Lotion. Each product's description includes features, benefits, and promising customer reviews, providing insights into their potential impact on the market.

articles.title: Tomkid Technologies issues new development service terms
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Tomkid Technologies released updated Terms and Conditions for its web and app development services. The update enhances clarity, timelines, and client accountability related to the service.

articles.title: Nestl Reports Strong Q1, Reaffirms Focus On Innovation To Meet Changing Consumer Needs
articles.author: Daily Independent
articles.summary: Nestl Nigeria Plc is committed to meeting evolving consumer needs through innovation and renovation. The company reported a 61% jump in revenue.

articles.title: GM working to bring missing equipment to Australia
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: General Motors is launching vehicles with limited features compared to overseas models. The company plans to address the missing satellite navigation and connected services in future releases.

articles.title: GM working to bring missing equipment to Australia
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: The company is targeting to launch a connected car service similar to OnStar, offering features like phone interaction, navigation, and other functionalities through a phone application.

articles.title: R/GA Unveils AI Tool to Help Brands Improve Visibility in Generative Search
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: Creative Innovation Company R/GA has launched its AI Search Optimization (ASO) Platform, the first release under its new AI Products Practice, backed by a $50 million Innovation Fund. The ASO Platform helps brands assess and improve their visibility across AI-driven search experiences like Google Gemini, Perplexity, ChatGPT, Claude, and Deepseek, offering real-time diagnostics and insights. Key features include real-time tracking of brand presence, sentiment analysis, competitive benchmarking, and actionable strategy recommendations.

articles.title: 35 Products You'll Take One Look At And Think 'You Belong With Meeeee'
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch and introduction of new products from various companies. Belif introduces Aqua Bomb SPF 45 sunscreen, and The Pink Stuff launches its Sqeezy sponge set, while Ninja presents its Crispi Air Fryer system. Other new products include Verve's pour-over coffee maker and Curlinator Designs' 2-in-1 hair bun maker, with Hanalei offering an overnight lip treatment and Vimhue launching running hats designed for high ponytails.

articles.title: Boston Celtics PREFERRED matchup set: New York Knicks in round 2
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers its content streaming through the WeAreIowa app on mobile phones.

articles.title: The State News Crossword, May 2, 2025
articles.summary: StateNews.com launched a new version of their website, inviting users to test drive the updated platform. The company is promoting the new StateNews.com service.

articles.title: I worked at Boots and this skincare product with 'instant results' would fly off the shelves
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: WISHFUL introduced Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub, priced at £27.20 at Boots and £34 at Cult Beauty. The enzyme scrub utilizes AHAs and BHAs for removing dead skin cells and providing a brighter skin tone. Brand testing indicated that 100% of users agreed to immediate results of skin going "from dull to glowy", as well as the product creating a "smooth canvas for makeup".

articles.title: Robotic hair washer to enter Hong Kong market in June after gaining interest on mainland
articles.author: Coco Feng
org: Guangdong Sheng Tai Health Technology Group
articles.summary: Faxiaoka AI Hair Care is launching its innovative hair-washing robot service in Hong Kong in June, equipped with second-generation hair washers priced at HK$99. The company, owned by Guangdong Sheng Tai Health Technology Group, is also planning to expand its network to 100 stores across mainland China and explore overseas markets, with the aim of reducing labor costs in hair care.

articles.title: Today's customers expect the hyper-personal touch
articles.author: Anna Meikle
articles.summary: The article highlights the shift towards hyper-personalization in customer experience, specifically within financial institutions. It introduces the concept of AI-driven dynamic accounts based on cash flow and a single destination for all protection needs. Additionally, the article mentions life-centric pension propositions where users are prompted to take action to improve wealth.

articles.title: Smart spin on success
articles.author: MB Technews
articles.summary: LG Commercial Washers, specifically the LG Onyx C Max Models, are being introduced with new smart solution features. Laundry Lounge is adopting these new machines, which offer improved monitoring capabilities and high laundry standards, contributing to the business's growth and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Playstation 6 and new Xbox release are revealed
articles.author: Natasha Kumar
articles.summary: Microsoft has confirmed it is developing the next version of the Xbox with serious technical innovations and Sony is determined to stay in the console market. Rumors suggest that the PlayStation 6 and new Xbox could launch around 2027, potentially indicated by a cancelled Blade Runner game which was planned to be released on the new consoles.

articles.title: Shoppers 'buying several' of dress 'very flattering for waist and tummy'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Next is offering the Jersey Waisted Summer Dress for £38, available in cream, navy, and olive green, and in sizes 6 to 26 with 'tall' and 'petite' versions.  The dress, made from soft jersey fabric, features a square neckline, waist detailing, and side pockets, and is available to purchase from Next.

articles.title: NudeSauce Launches Four New Skincare Products, Revolutionizing the Industry
articles.summary: NudeSauce is launching its clean beauty line on May 2, 2025, which includes four new products: Raw Body Butter, Calming Recovery Cream, Dead Sea Mask, and Minty Coffee Scrub. The products are ethically crafted and aim to provide effective, sustainable, and cruelty-free skincare solutions. NudeSauce emphasizes clean ingredients and environmentally conscious practices.

articles.title: Google reveals powerful NotebookLM app for Android and iOS with release date – here's what ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: NotebookLM apps are launching on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store. Pre-orders are currently available for these new apps.

articles.title: Affordable Premium cPanel hosting, NVMe, LiteSpeed, JetBackup, Free Migration support
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: An unspecified company offers blazing fast and secure web hosting services with a 30% recurring discount this week. The web hosting features ultra-fast NVMe SSD storage with up to 20x faster performance, LiteSpeed + LSCache, cPanel & Softaculous, JetBackup 30 Days Daily Backups & Free SSL.

articles.title: Why this Lenovo Yoga is my pick for best MacBook Air alternative (and it's $300 off)
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Lenovo launched the 10th-gen Yoga Slim 9i. The new product features a vivid OLED touchscreen, strong performance, and a sleek design.

articles.title: Cholula® Expands its Presence in the Mexican Aisle with its Largest Product Launch Yet
articles.author: Lebanon Express
articles.summary: A company is launching 'Birria Cooking Sauce,' along with 10 other authentic Mexican products, nationwide. This introduces a new product to consumers.

articles.title: Media sector is steadily using AI for its personalisation abilities: NVIDIA
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: NVIDIA is promoting HoloScan for Media, its latest platform, suggesting a new product or service offering from the company related to media technology.

articles.title: Thesisx-Backed Fold Celebrates First Bitcoin Financial Services Listing on Nasdaq with Opening Bell Ceremony
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: Thesis pioneers Bitcoin-native financial innovation. Thesis aims to provide access to crypto products to average consumers.

articles.title: Blazing Fast Nintendo Switch 2 Storage Has Arrived Early
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lexar is offering an early look at its new microSDXC Express expanded storage card. This product is designed to be compatible with Nintendo's upcoming console, Switch 2.
